name: Divisions; formation of
text: §123-2  Divisions; formation of.  Divisions may be formed in the discretion of the governor, on the islands of Oahu, Maui, Hawaii, and Kauai, not to exceed the maximum force of four divisions for the State. [L 1915, c 151, §2; RL 1925, §272; RL 1935, §7861; RL 1945, §13081; RL 1955, §354-2; HRS §123-2]
